presentation.p: Discover each dish with captivating videos, complete details, and reviews. Take your menu experience to the next level and connect better with your customers.

banner.h2: Showcase Your Menu Like Never Before
banner.p: Highlight your signature dishes and create memorable dining experiences with interactive videos. Engage and impress your audience today!

pricing.p: Whether you’re one person trying to get ahead or a big firm trying to take over the world, we’ve got a plan for you.

starter.p: Ideal for restaurants looking to try the platform and offer their customers a simplified version of their digital menu.
starter.item1: Display up to 10 dishes per category.
starter.item3: Generate a standard QR code without logo.

professional.p: Designed for restaurants that want to offer a complete digital experience with advanced customization and flexibility.
professional.item1: Unlimited display of dishes in carousel format.
professional.item2: Unlimited categories to organize your menu.
professional.item3: Customizable QR code with logo and brand colors.
professional.item5: Basic analytics on menu views and QR usage.
professional.item6: Priority technical support via email and chat.
professional.item7: Option to link social media accounts from the menu.

premium.p: Perfect for restaurants or chains looking for a fully customized digital menu experience with advanced features and dedicated support.
premium.item1: We take care of setting up your menu and uploading all videos and images.
premium.item2: We come to your location to conduct a photo and video session.
premium.item3: Customized QR code with logo and brand colors.
premium.item5: Advanced analytics on menu views and QR usage.
premium.item6: 24/7 dedicated technical support with phone and video assistance.

motivation.p: Creativity in the kitchen is the key to standing out. Dare to innovate!
